equinox.plugin

Interface PluginProcess


  • public interface PluginProcess
    Interface for plugin processes.
    Author:
    Murat Artim
    Date:
    Mar 25, 2015
    Time:
    6:21:47 PM

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBeCancelled()
      Returns true if this process can be cancelled.
      java.nio.file.Path getOutputDirectory()
      Returns output directory of this process.
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      Returns the process title.
      java.lang.String getWarnings()
      Returns warning messages of the process, or empty string if there is no warning.
      boolean isDirectoryOutputting()
      Returns true if this process is directory outputting.
      boolean isLongRunning()
      Returns true if this process is long running.
      boolean needsDatabaseConnection()
      Returns true if this process requires database connection.
      boolean needsWorkingDirectory()
      Returns true if this process requires working directory.
      void onCancelled()
      Called when the process cancelled.
      void onFailed(java.lang.Throwable e)
      Called when the process failed.
      void onSucceeded(java.lang.Object result)
      Called when the process is successfully completed.
      java.lang.Object start(EquinoxTask<java.lang.Object> ownerTask, java.nio.file.Path workingDirectory, java.sql.Connection connection)
      Starts this process.

    • Method Detail

      • needsWorkingDirectory

        boolean needsWorkingDirectory()
        Returns true if this process requires working directory.
        Returns:
        True if this process requires working directory.

      • needsDatabaseConnection

        boolean needsDatabaseConnection()
        Returns true if this process requires database connection.
        Returns:
        True if this process requires database connection.

      • isLongRunning

        boolean isLongRunning()
        Returns true if this process is long running.
        Returns:
        True if this process is long running.

      • isDirectoryOutputting

        boolean isDirectoryOutputting()
        Returns true if this process is directory outputting.
        Returns:
        True if this process is directory outputting.

      • canBeCancelled

        boolean canBeCancelled()
        Returns true if this process can be cancelled.
        Returns:
        True if this process can be cancelled.

      • getTitle

        java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns the process title.
        Returns:
        The process title.

      • getWarnings

        java.lang.String getWarnings()
        Returns warning messages of the process, or empty string if there is no warning.
        Returns:
        Warning messages of the process, or empty string if there is no warning.

      • getOutputDirectory

        java.nio.file.Path getOutputDirectory()
        Returns output directory of this process. Note that, this is only needed if isDirectoryOutputting() returns true. Otherwise return null.
        Returns:
        Output directory of this process.

      • onSucceeded

        void onSucceeded(java.lang.Object result)
        Called when the process is successfully completed.
        Parameters:
        result - Result of this process.

      • onFailed

        void onFailed(java.lang.Throwable e)
        Called when the process failed.
        Parameters:
        e - Exception.

      • onCancelled

        void onCancelled()
        Called when the process cancelled.

      • start

        java.lang.Object start(EquinoxTask<java.lang.Object> ownerTask,
                       java.nio.file.Path workingDirectory,
                       java.sql.Connection connection)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts this process.
        Parameters:
        ownerTask - The owner task.
        workingDirectory - Working directory of this process. Note that, this will be null if needsWorkingDirectory() returns false.
        connection - Database connection. Note that, this will be null if needsDatabaseConnection() returns false.
        Returns:
        The result of this process.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If exception occurs during process.
